name: Haunted Vlogs
description:
Two teenagers, a vlogger and her cameraman go to explore an abandoned college, searching for clues and eventually an exit. There is a small tension between them, will they tell their feelings before it's too late?

     This is my first game, It's done as a college project game prototype. I am an artist with no previous experience in rpg maker or story writing. I made this game to learn and to also make my childhood wish of making a horror RPG maker game come true. It's more of an exploration, roleplay game with a horror theme and elements. 

- The whole game ( art + story + programming + testing was made in just 2 weeks, so I'm sorry for the inconsistency and lack of polishing and story logic. Also English is not my first language, sorry for the grammar issues!

The game has mild swearing and blood.

  • save the zip file
  • extract it
  • open the folder and run "Game.exe"
  •  5 Endings
  •  Exploration, dialogue, and puzzles
  •  1-2 hours of gameplay 

UPDATE 1:

I got rid of all save points, you can save anytime from the menu

The ghost won't be as annoying and block you so easily in spots.

Added an "endings guide" text file in the game folder in case you want to get help on how to get all endings.

More updates to come.

The game is available in English, but I will make a Romanian version too.

Also I might make an update after I clean up the project, for now I'm having a lot of problems while optimizing the file size and have to do it manually which will take a lot of time, so sorry, for now that's what i have.
